title: Investigate the Beach
content: of our playthroughs, we found that the Bard had a high chance to break through the trance. You'll have the option to sing along with the tune which breaks you from the trance, and eventually, the child. If you succeed, the child will eventually disengage and run far from the scene of the fight. If you see a harpy start to sing, divert your attention to the singing harpy to break its concentration. Defeat the harpies, and talk to the boy, he'll give you the password you need to say to Doni so yo
